Summary._: Southbound [F] and Broadway Junction-bound [M] trains have service changes and delays because of signal problems at 42 St-Bryant Park. See mta.info

Description._: Southbound [F] and Broadway Junction-bound [M] trains have service changes and delays because of signal problems at 42 St-Bryant Park. See mta.info

LongDescription:
Some southbound [F] trains are stopping along the [G] line from Jackson Hts-Roosevelt Av to Bergen St.
Some Broadway Junction-bound [M] trains are stopping along the [E] line from Queens Plaza to W 4 St-Washington Sq.
These service changes are because of signal problems at 42 St-Bryant Park. 
You may experience delays on the [F], [G] and [M] trains.

Summary._: SCHEDULED MAINTENANCE  [SIR] Trains board at the Tottenville-bound platform from Huguenot to Eltingville Stations

LongDescription: <b><i>SCHEDULED MAINTENANCE</i><br clear=left>[SIR] Trains board at the Tottenville-bound platform from Huguenot to Eltingville Stations</b>Day, 9 AM to 3 PM, Tuesday, Apr 3<br><br> Boarding change includes <b>Huguenot</b>, <b>Annadale</b> and <b>Eltingville Stations</b>.<br><b><br>
